website_summaries.verdict: The best way to carry a large assortment of DSLR camera lenses in a single convenient case.
pros: Large case has room for eight individual lenses with a separate protective pouch
Each pouch side can be removed to open up room for larger lenses as well
cons: Joint lens space does not offer as much padding between the lenses as individual cases

customer_reviews.title: SIZE IS PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these (2) because the fit perfectly inside my bag. I have used it as a carry on or a small suitcase, but now it holds most of my photo stuff. These bags alone would be fairly padded for general use, though they are not rigid. I think it would be odd to carry one around with the handle on the top. The carry strap maybe should have attached closer to one end than the center. BUT, they are inserts. The material looks good and feels durable. I have no doubts my equipment is safe inside "ebag & the inserts.
customer_reviews.author: DFB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Storage, Pretty Big to be Portable
customer_reviews.text: I have a small camera bag that I use to take equipment with me when I travel, but I needed something to store equipment in when I'm not using it. This is perfect for that--it has dividers that can make up to 8 compartments for lenses, camera bodies or flash units. It only has one zip pocket so there's not a lot of room to compartmentalized those loose odds and ends you collect. It's also pretty bulky and heavy when full so it's better suited to safely holding your equipment in the closet at home rather than out on the road.
customer_reviews.author: barmcd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent insert bag for camera lens storage
customer_reviews.text: My bevy of SLR and DSLR lenses was getting out of control, and needed to be managed better. I found this bag to be exactly what I needed. It holds all my lenses comfortably, fits perfectly into the storage space where I keep my lenses. Decided to purchase a second insert bag to hold my various camera bodies. I'm using this bag for static storage purposes. But it's very well built and would definitely hold up under travel conditions too. Comes with velcro inserts, and a shoulder strap. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: this is what I needed
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I would change is to make about 3 inches longer. I have three camera body's, two lenses, two chargers, two sets of filters, lens hoods and various cables. I have another camera that I would like to keep in the same case and I just can't find one like this but bigger. But this case in very nice, I really like it and will use it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great camera protection and fits a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a padded camera case for my Nikon d750 and various lenses. It fits all my gear perfectly. It's easy to quickly transport with the straps if I need it or it fits perfectly in my roll on if I'm traveling. It survived getting dragged around to shoot a wedding, and protected all my gear from an exploded shampoo bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Long

customer_reviews.title: Works, but stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: We have a very agitated German Shepherd and gave Calming Bites a try. They took a bit of the edge off which is an improvement in behavior for our dog. However, it gave her a bad case of diarrhea. We were hoping it was something else, and took her off the medication for a couple of weeks, but once we started back up, so did the diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dawson

customer_reviews.title: fantastic light use case
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much, I bought another a year later. The parts inside are completely moveable and I can quickly change the configuration to fit whatever camera or accessories I need to bring with me at that moment. They are sturdy enough to stack on each other, but they are definitely not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great lens case for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this solely to store my lenses. I am a pro and I have a lot of them. My 70-200 does not fit without taking out sections and thus eliminating multiple other lenses so I have taken the practice of keeping it on my camera body when I am packed up. My 105mm F1.4 fits without the hood. My 14-24mm f2.8 does as well. I put lens cleaning clothes and brushes in the zipped area on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling T Steves

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lens case and this fit the bill nicely. Keeps my lenses organized and clean. While you can fit a camera in as well I configured mine for 8 lenses. The larges it a 70-300 USM and while it is tight it fits without distorting the top of the case. Will probably buy a second shortly as I seem to have a lens addition.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good case for storage but probably not in the field.
customer_reviews.text: Nice storage compartment for lenses but I wouldn't take it in the field with me. Cheap build that does not inspire confidence or safety, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas m

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for my fishing reels
customer_reviews.text: Man it’s tough to find a reel bag for under $60-70! This camera bag is perfect and you can adjust the size and number of compartments as well. Currently my bag hold 4 spinning reels, size ranging from 3-4000. If I took off the handles I could probably fit 6 (with handles included). Bag quality is good and it’s a great way to transport my reels without damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material and craftsmanship. Easy to adjust velcro compartments. Fits almost anywhere. A little slot for documents. If I wanted to put my camera and 2 favorite lenses, extra battery and SSD in there and use it as my go bag I probably could.
customer_reviews.author: Cory K.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality. Works for now.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a pretty good deal. Although if I can find something around the same size but sturdier, I will most likely switch to that. But, for now, this should work well enough for most situations.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Groves

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing...
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing my cameras and lenses. Great protection. Roomy. Adjustable partitions. I will probably order another. Note: this recommendation does not extend to heavy road use. It is, after all, an insert.
customer_reviews.author: seaapeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This is a Good Bag especially for lenses or Action Cams 👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag and the form factor makes it easy to rearrange the pads. Zipper is good bag is a good thickness but could always be thicker the pads are good. For the money this is a good bag and the design is different. I like this kind of form factor easy access shallower. May get another one for my action cameras or my recorders and mics. ✔
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra lenses
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with it. The zipper is a little awkward sometimes when going around the corners, but other than that, no qualms. I use it for only storing lenses I don’t use frequently. I’m not digging around for batteries or sd cards. In my instance, the ya perfect. The padding is dence, and the inserts are easily customizable for many configurations. There is also one flat pocket under the top of the bag, good for flat or crushable things like SD cards or lens cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cotta

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with more lenses then I had room for and they became hard to keep track of. The case stays in the house and I change out lenses as I need them. The case does not have to be overly sturdy or waterproof . Therefore this case is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: G.Karl

customer_reviews.title: Good lens organizer
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having lenses in multiple places and various pouches. I wanted a one stop location for all my lenses. After seeing the reviews, I picked this one. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: J. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to travel with my camera lens assortment
customer_reviews.text: Needed a protective case to travel with my assortment of SLR lenses, this bag is perfectly sized to store and transport my six lenses without damage and frees up space in my camera sling bag. The bag is well built and sturdy considering the cost, a good buy and overall very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not just a camera bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use for storing my fishing reels! It works great! The dividers are removable and you can create larger spaces if need be. I'm able to store all of my reels in one case which makes it easy for transporting them in the back of the car!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bollenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good option to keep lenses and accessories organized
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lens storage container for my most frequently used lenses, that would fit well inside another cabinet, and this one worked perfectly. I configured it to store six DSLR lenses and a few smaller accessories. Materials seem to be of good quality, the bottom doesn't sag, the sides are plenty stiff, and there's sufficient padding to protect the lenses when I slide the bag in and out of the cabinet. Overall, i'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Ducatte

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality lens case.
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable case which works as expected to hold lenses and miscellaneous photo gear. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nekobasu

customer_reviews.title: Does What I Need
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about this before purchasing it myself. I realized that I had quite a few lenses and needed something to store them in. This fits the bill perfectly. I won't use the strap for travel because it'll be stationary for me but it seems like it'll hold up quite nicely to travel with as well. It holds the lenses that I need. The only con is that it could have had an extra storage compartment but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: RABroughton

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend using a lens case if you plan on using ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most robust camera protection case. I would trust these more for accessories or speedlites and not your expensive lenses. I would recommend using a lens case if you plan on using this to organize gear but whats the point? Just purchase a beefier (a bit more expensive) camera insert. Does the job but just too thin for my needs. I dont feel confident.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Phan

customer_reviews.title: A great storage vessel for camera equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Koolertron bag. It keeps my equipment safe. Note- This is not luggage. It is a liner for a harder case. Great padding!
customer_reviews.author: seaapeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking and professional. When I order my two new lenses I will order another bag. I have my lenses in it and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlayne A. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good for lens storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought for lens storage, and happy with it for that purpose. The sides are thin, so would not use for general transport - probably ok for "office to car", but I wouldn't carry out to location.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions weren’t as advertised, outside dimensions were inside dimensions so was too big to fit in my bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Customizable inside and very spacious for all your stuff. I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and roomy for lots of lenses. I bought it as an insert for a larger bag. It's a good alternative to expensive bags.
customer_reviews.author: Juxtagirl

customer_reviews.title: Lens bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice lens bag I keep mostly in my home for storage but it’s got a nice handle for carrying ease
customer_reviews.author: PBoss

customer_reviews.title: lens case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Just what I wanted. Fits up to six mid-sized lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It provides a great way to store all my lenses in one place
customer_reviews.text: It provides a great way to store all my lenses in one place. It is nicely padded, but I wouldn't use it for travel. It isn't sturdy enough for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: A great case - just what I needed. Many, many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R A A. 111

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wandrd hexad access duffel
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these instead of the camera cubes made by wandrd, and they fit perfectly. They are also about an inch taller and the padding / dividers are higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price. Could not find anything similar at my local stores. Can hold a great amount of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: not as tough as I'd prefer but good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: It's a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I expected. It's a bag that hold's lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought. I may get another.
customer_reviews.author: kdk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying my Lowell Tota lights with cord and extra bulbs. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: CDolman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it to store extra lens. Will sit on front seat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a fly reel and fly box ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a fly reel and fly box case and all my little accessories fit in there too.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great place to keep my lens. But I would not put this on a plane as luggage.
customer_reviews.author: LP Green

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for exactly what I need. It fits all my lenses plus more gear that I use. It is very versitile and can be shaped to fit just about anything. I put 5 lenses plus several other items and still have room.
customer_reviews.author: dsimpson15

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little bag dedicated solely for lenses
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little bag dedicated solely for lenses. Holds them nice and neatly so I can look for and grab the one I need.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rego

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for storage. I wouldn't carry it over my shoulder, though.
customer_reviews.author: College Prof

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I fully met my expectations. It is a fine case.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Well made with no surprises.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and arrived just as described. I use it as an insert with my 60L hiking backpack for my camera gear.
customer_reviews.author: David Frees

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: Product could be ok. When it was shipped, it was all bent up and all the interior pieces were eveywhere
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Before Price Increase
customer_reviews.text: Good product (I ordered two), but price was raised considerably following my purchase. I will not be buying more unless the price goes back down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

product_meta.title: Koolertron Camera Case DSLR Camera Insert Bag Purse Universal Liner Lens Pouch Partition Protective Cover Waterproof Sleeve for Cannon/Nikon/Sony (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Features:

Enough for storing a DSLR/SLR camera and a camera lens, well matches your backpack or shoulder bag
Can be used as a single shoulder camera bag
Padded liner keeps the camera from shock and scratch
Material: Nylon Oxford EPE
Size:33cmx23cmX16cm（12.99in x9.06nx6.30in)

Package:

1x Camera case

NOTE:

Please compare above detailed size with your measurement before purchase.
Please allow 1-2cm differs due to manual measurement.
feature_bullets: Enough for storing a DSLR/SLR camera and a camera lens, well matches your backpack or shoulder bag
Can be used as a single shoulder camera bag
Padded liner keeps the camera from shock and scratch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
